Verses: 1 karththaave, En Vaarththaigalukku Sevikodum, En Dhiyaanaththaik Gavaniyum.
2 naan Ummidaththil Vinnappampannuven; En Raajaave, En Dhevane, En Vendudhalin Saththaththaik Kettarulum.
3 karththaave, Kaalaiyile En Saththaththaik Kettaruluveer; Kaalaiyile Umakku Nere Vandhu Aayaththamaagi, Kaaththiruppen.
4 neer Dhunmaarkkaththil Piriyappadugira Dhevan Alla; Theemai Ummidaththil Servadhillai.
5 veembukkaarar Ummudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Nilainirkamaattaargal; Akkiramakkaarar Yaavaraiyum Verukkireer.
6 poi Pesugiravargalai Azhippeer; Raththappiriyanaiyum Soodhulla Manushanaiyum Karththar Aruvarukkiraar.
7 naano Umadhu Migundha Kirubaiyinaale Umadhu Aalayaththukkul Piravesiththu, Umadhu Parisuththa Sannidhikku Nere Bayabakthiyudan Panindhukolluven.
8 karththaave, En Saththurukkalinimiththam Ennai Ummudaiya Needhiyile Nadaththi, Enakkumunbaaga Ummudaiya Vazhiyah Sevvaippaduththum.
9 avargal Vaayil Unmai Illai, Avargal Ullam Kedupaadulladhu; Avargal Thondai Thirakkappatta Piredhakkuzhi; Thangal Naavinaal Ichchagam Pesugiraargal.

10 dhevane, Avargalaik Kutravaaligalaagath Theerum; Avargal Thangal Aalosanaigalaaleye Vizhumpadiseyyum; Avargal Thurokangalinudaiya Thiratchiyinimiththam Avargalaith Thallividum; Umakku Virodhamaaik Kalagampanninaargale.
11 ummai Nambugiravargal Yaavarum Sandhoshiththu, Ennaalum Gembeerippaargalaaga; Neer Avargalaik Kaappaatruveer; Ummudaiya Naamaththai Nesikkiravarkal Ummil Kalikooruvaargalaaga.
12 karththaave, Neer Needhimaanai Aaseervadhiththu, Kaaruniyam Ennung Kedagaththinaal Avanai Soozhndhukolveer.
